QuestData.Title: Relics of the Swarm
QuestData.Description: This strange-looking carving is covered in a complex written language that might be mantid in origin.$B$BYou notice more relics strewn carelessly among the camps and inside the lake.$B$BPerhaps the Klaxxi would be interested in examining these artifacts.$B$BWho knows? Perhaps it will earn you some favor.
QuestData.RewardText: These relics describe the history of Kypari Vos and the nearby amber trees.$B$BI would like to study these.$B$BThank you, $c.
